profile: Senior IT & Software Professional and Full-Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience across enterprise IT, automotive manufacturing, and modern web application development. Expert in Agile Software Development, Agile Project Management, Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, MSSQL, and enterprise IT operations, with a strong track record as Project Lead and IT Consultant. Led a local datacenter transformation and optimization project, reducing a planned 5-year budget from approximately €1.5 million to €170,000 through requirement optimization and efficient solution design.

employment.title: IT and Software Professional
highlights: Business Relationship Manager and IT-Consultant for Engineering
Project Lead for local datacenter transformation and optimization
Planned and managed a projected 5-year budget of approximately €1.5 million
Optimized technical and operational requirements, reducing the total project budget to €170,000 while maintaining required service levels and operational stability
Responsible person for datacenter operation and managing the serviceprovider
Full-Stack-Developer: Angular, TypeScript, SCSS, Jest, NodeJS Express, Keycloak, MSSQL

Negotiated new internet contracts and tariffs
